name: Omega Royale
summary:
We're about to light the world of Tower Defense on fire with Omega Royale!

With Omega Royale we've reinvented Tower Defense. Not only are we improving the gameplay, we're also setting the model for the next generation of games utilizing blockchains, by offering all our players a true free to play game where everyone has a chance to add value to their card collections!
